participant_1.background:
I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
i am always looking for wildlife when i am outside.
i like to drink chai tea before bed every night.
I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
My daily routine is pretty relaxed as I'm taking a year off before college, but I like to make sure I keep busy and get some reading in on the weekends.

participant_2.background:
I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean.
I was a musician before my current job.
i enjoy horseback riding.
i am a full time mom.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

content.text: Hello! I love swimming in the lake. Have you ever been swimming in the ocean?
I have never been swimming in the ocean, I am afraid of sharks. I love watching the dolphins in the ocean though!
I've never seen a shark in the wild, I am more worried about the jellyfish!
I never thought about jellyfish! I am more afraid of falling off a boat and drowning.
That's why I don't go boating! I am not a good swimmer.
I used to be a musician, but now I am a full time mom.
Wow, that's a big change! I'm sure you are a great mom.
I try my best! I love spending time with my kids.
That's great! I'm going to take a year off before college, so I'm enjoying my time off.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I could have a year off.
It's been nice, but I'm ready to start college.
Good luck with college! I'm sure you will do great!
